timeline.message:
DHFPROD-5466: Removing cypress e2e from on-prem pipeline

Running windows tests before quickstart

Fixing typo

Moving the DHS pipeline stage

Deleting Docker file

timeline.bodyText: we need '' for mac. Is it not working on linux/windows?
timeline.author: bsrikan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,7 +17,7 @@ cd hc-qa-project
 if $DHS
 then
         env=dhs
-        sed -i '' "s/mlHost=/mlHost=$mlHost/g" gradle-dhs.properties
+        sed -i  "s/mlHost=/mlHost=$mlHost/g" gradle-dhs.properties

replies.bodyText: No its not working on linux. We will be running on linux machines
replies.author: SameeraPriyathamTadikonda

replies.bodyText:
Can we try using perl -i -pe"s/mlHost=/mlHost=$mlHost/g" gradle-dhs.properties instead.
Works in mac and hopefully works on all platforms.
replies.author: bsrikan

timeline.message: Commad that runs on linux and mac
